entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
